meta.title: Best Dogs for Miami Living: Heat & Humidity Guide
meta.description: Living in Miami with a dog? Discover the best breeds for hot weather, top dog beaches, and tips for keeping your pup cool in the 305.

local_tips: Avoid walking on hot pavement between 11 AM and 4 PM.
Many beaches have specific dog-friendly hours.
